entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
